nodes.text: Feethan Ottraw Scalable Assemblies was a starship manufacturer that produced the Belbullab-22 heavy starfighter.

Feethan Ottraw Scalable Assemblies was first mentioned in the Star Wars Legends reference book Star Wars: Revenge of the Sith Incredible Cross-Sections, which was written by Curtis Saxton and released in 2005. The company was confirmed to be canon by the reference book Ultimate Star Wars, which was released in 2015.
